subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The friendly rivalry between Tennessee Coach Pat Summitt and Rutgers Coach C. Vivian Stringer will be on display Saturday when Rutgers hosts Tennessee in a nationally televised game.
snippet: The friendly rivalry between Tennessee Coach Pat Summitt and Rutgers Coach C. Vivian Stringer will be on display Saturday when Rutgers hosts Tennessee in a nationally televised game.
